alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Rio Blanco County through 545 PM MDT... At 519 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Rangely, or 44 miles southeast of Vernal, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rangely. This includes the following highways... Colorado 64 between mile markers 10 and 20. Colorado 139 between mile markers 69 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
